title: Cant log into main account
body:
Hey Cant log into my main account, 

I still have access to the email address and the name, im not sure why i cant log on.

Some help would be awesome, the name of the account is <snip> and its on oceania.

After doing some research it looks like someone has transferred my account, i havent played it on for a while.

The email says this : 

You've recently requested a change to your Riot Games account associated with: <snip>
To complete this process, enter the following special access code into the security dialog: 

<snip>
Read this guide to learn more about account security: Protecting Your Account.

Can someone help it looks like someone might have hacked into. 

Ive spent a fair bit of money on the account =(

replies.body:
Hey there,

Please [submit an account recovery ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to Player Support, they should be able to assist you if you're able to prove ownership of the account.

I've gone ahead and snipped any account related info from your post.
